item.text: Finally, my brothers and sisters, rejoice in the Lord! To write this again is no trouble to me, and it is a safeguard for you.
Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of those who mutilate the flesh!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st>,<n id="1" /> the ones who <st data-num="3000" class="">worship</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2744" class="">exult</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3982" class="">rely</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4561">human credentials</st><n id="3" />

—<st data-num="2539">though</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">mine</st>, too, are significant.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">thinks</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="4006" class="">good reasons</st> to <st data-num="3982">put confidence</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">human credentials</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="3123">more</st>:

I was <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcised</st> on the <st data-num="3637">eighth day</st>, <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1085" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> and the <st data-num="5443" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="958" class="">Benjamin</st>, a <st data-num="1445" class="">Hebrew</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="1445" class="">Hebrews</st>. I lived <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> as a <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2596" class="">In</st> my <st data-num="2205" class="">zeal</st> for God I <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>. <st data-num="2596" class="">According to</st> the <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> stipulated <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> I <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="273" class="">blameless</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2771" class="">assets</st> I have come to <st data-num="2233" class="">regard</st> as <st data-num="2209" class="">liabilities</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="235 3304">More than that</st>, I now <st data-num="2233" class="">regard</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all things</st> as <st data-num="2209" class="">liabilities</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">compared</st> to the <st data-num="5242" class="">far greater value</st> of <st data-num="1108" class="">knowing</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> I have <st data-num="2210">suffered the loss</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all things</st> —<st data-num="2532" class="">indeed</st>, I <st data-num="2233" class="">regard</st> them as <st data-num="4657" class="">dung</st>!<n id="1" />—<st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> I may <st data-num="2770" class="">gain</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> because I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1699">my own</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> derived <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> I have the righteousness that comes <st data-num="1223" class="">by way of</st> <st data-num="5547">Christ’s</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st><n id="1" />—a <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> that is in fact<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909">based on</st> Christ’s<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st>.<n id="4" />

My aim is to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> to experience the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st>, to <st data-num="2842" class="">share</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st>,<n id="2" /> and to <st data-num="4832">be like</st> him in <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>,
and so, somehow, to attain to the resurrection from the dead.
Not that I have already attained this—that is, I have not already been perfected—but I strive to lay hold of that for which Christ Jesus also laid hold of me.

<st data-num="80" class="">Brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3049" class="">consider</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st> to have <st data-num="2638" class="">attained</st> this. <st data-num="1161" class="">Instead</st> I am <st data-num="1520">single-minded</st>:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1950" class="">Forgetting</st> the things that are <st data-num="3694" class="">behind</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1901">reaching out</st> for <st data-num="3588">the things</st> that are <st data-num="1715" class="">ahead</st>,

<st data-num="2596" class="">with</st> this <st data-num="4649">goal in mind</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="1377" class="">strive</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="1017" class="">prize</st> of the <st data-num="507" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="2821" class="">call</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> let <st data-num="3745">those of us who</st> are “<st data-num="5046">perfect</st>”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5426" class="">embrace</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> point of view.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5426" class="">think</st> <st data-num="2088" class="">otherwise</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="601" class="">reveal</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3778">the error of your ways</st>.<n id="3" />
Nevertheless, let us live up to the standard that we have already attained.
Be imitators of me, brothers and sisters, and watch carefully those who are living this way, just as you have us as an example.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st>, about <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> I have <st data-num="4178" class="">often</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, with <st data-num="2799" class="">tears</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> you that they are the <st data-num="2190" class="">enemies</st> of the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="3739">Their</st> <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> is <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>, <st data-num="3739">their</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">god</st> is the <st data-num="2836" class="">belly</st>, they <st data-num="1391" class="">exult</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="152" class="">shame</st>, and they <st data-num="5426">think about</st> <st data-num="1919">earthly things</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4175" class="">citizenship</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we also <st data-num="553">eagerly await</st> a <st data-num="4990" class="">savior</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3739">there</st>, the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,
who will transform these humble bodies of ours into the likeness of his glorious body by means of that power by which he is able to subject all things to himself.
